channel.title: Morning Briefing · Property
channel.description: Daily AU commercial property briefing — assets, funds, deals, development.

item.title: Gateway Capital buys into Sydney’s Eastern Creek as it seeds $800m fund
item.description: While major property players struggle with redemptions, Gateway Capital has seized on an opportunity to acquire a prime $75m Sydney logistics facility.
item.content:encoded: While major property players struggle with redemptions, Gateway Capital has seized on an opportunity to acquire a prime $75m Sydney logistics facility.

item.title: Dexus sells Flinders Gate complex to Asian investor PAG
item.description: The property giant has sold its prime Melbourne office complex near Federation Square for $260m as it moves to trim debt and focus on higher-returning assets.
item.content:encoded: The property giant has sold its prime Melbourne office complex near Federation Square for $260m as it moves to trim debt and focus on higher-returning assets.

item.title: Elanor rejects billionaire Lederer’s claims in $276m fund battle
item.description: Embattled property funds manager Elanor Investors Group has fired back at billionaire Paul Lederer’s moves to take over its $276m listed office fund.
item.content:encoded: Embattled property funds manager Elanor Investors Group has fired back at billionaire Paul Lederer’s moves to take over its $276m listed office fund.

item.title: Meriton’s Harry Triguboff reveals plans for luxury Brisbane waterfront hotel
item.description: Property billionaire Harry Triguboff has defied tourism headwinds to claim the crown as Australia’s top-ranking hotel owner, with ambitious plans for more luxury sites.
item.content:encoded: Property billionaire Harry Triguboff has defied tourism headwinds to claim the crown as Australia’s top-ranking hotel owner, with ambitious plans for more luxury sites.

item.title: ASIC review of stamp duty reporting could spark super fund splurge on property
item.description: ASIC’s review of superannuation stamp duty reporting rules could unlock $10bn for property investment and deliver 35,000 new homes within five years.
item.content:encoded: ASIC’s review of superannuation stamp duty reporting rules could unlock $10bn for property investment and deliver 35,000 new homes within five years.

item.title: Metrics joins Deicorp as $1.8bn Sydney apartment venture takes shape
item.description: A massive $1.8bn development is set to transform Sydney’s Five Dock into a bustling village precinct that will supply nearly a quarter of the council’s housing target of 5,000 new homes by 2029.
item.content:encoded: A massive $1.8bn development is set to transform Sydney’s Five Dock into a bustling village precinct that will supply nearly a quarter of the council’s housing target of 5,000 new homes by 2029.

item.title: Eco-tourism gem springs onto market
item.description: From woodchips to wellness: This large former timber mill has been transformed into a 43ha coastal eco-resort — and it’s seeking a new owner.
item.content:encoded: From woodchips to wellness: This large former timber mill has been transformed into a 43ha coastal eco-resort — and it’s seeking a new owner.

item.title: Plans revealed for largest vacant site up for grabs in Geelong West
item.description: The last substantial vacant residential space in Geelong’s inner west has landed on the market as potential buyers mull townhouses, other uses.
item.content:encoded: The last substantial vacant residential space in Geelong’s inner west has landed on the market as potential buyers mull townhouses, other uses.

item.title: Kings Cross’s oldest bar snapped up by 28-year-old
item.description: Kings Cross’s oldest bar has been snapped up by a 28-year-old lawyer and entrepreneur.
item.content:encoded: Kings Cross’s oldest bar has been snapped up by a 28-year-old lawyer and entrepreneur.

item.title: Webinar: Inside the NSW Housing Pattern Book
item.description: In our exclusive one-hour presentation, hear from the leaders driving the initiative as they break it all down…
item.content:encoded: In our exclusive one-hour presentation, hear from the leaders driving the initiative as they break it all down…
